select count(dev.device_name) FROM mon_device_real AS mdr LEFT JOIN eqi_device AS dev ON mdr.app_id = dev.app_id LEFT JOIN eqi_equipment AS equ ON dev.equipment_int = equ.equipment_int LEFT JOIN war_alarm_event AS wae ON mdr.warning_content = wae.alarm_event_id LEFT JOIN base_access_info AS bai ON equ.acc_point_res_id = bai.acc_point_res_id LEFT JOIN base_process_info AS bpi ON bai.process_id = bpi.process_id
and equ.equipment_id like '%${equipmentId}%'
and equ.equipment_name like '%${equipmentName}%'
and dev.device_name like '%${deviceName}%'
and bpi.process_name like '%${processName}%'
and wae.alarm_event_title like '%${alarmEventTitle}%'
and wae.alarm_type like '%${alarmType}%'
and wae.alarm_level like '%${alarmLevel}%'
and wae.alarm_event_content like '%${alarmEventContent}%'
and mdr.occurrence_time like '%${occurrenceTime}%'

SELECT dev.device_id, equ.equipment_int, wae.alarm_event_id, wae.alarm_event_int, bai.acc_point_res_id, bpi.process_id, equ.equipment_id, equ.equipment_name, mdr.app_id, dev.device_name, bpi.process_name, wae.alarm_event_title, wae.alarm_type, wae.alarm_level, wae.alarm_event_content, mdr.occurrence_time FROM mon_device_real AS mdr LEFT JOIN eqi_device AS dev ON mdr.app_id = dev.app_id LEFT JOIN eqi_equipment AS equ ON dev.equipment_int = equ.equipment_int LEFT JOIN war_alarm_event AS wae ON mdr.warning_content = wae.alarm_event_id LEFT JOIN base_access_info AS bai ON equ.acc_point_res_id = bai.acc_point_res_id LEFT JOIN base_process_info AS bpi ON bai.process_id = bpi.process_id
and equ.equipment_id like '%${equipmentId}%'
and equ.equipment_name like '%${equipmentName}%'
and dev.device_name like '%${deviceName}%'
and bpi.process_name like '%${processName}%'
and wae.alarm_event_title like '%${alarmEventTitle}%'
and wae.alarm_type like '%${alarmType}%'
and wae.alarm_level like '%${alarmLevel}%'
and wae.alarm_event_content like '%${alarmEventContent}%'
and mdr.occurrence_time like '%${occurrenceTime}%'
order by ${field} ${order}
limit ${begin},${limit}
